item.title: Handling xlsx with python
item.description: install required files requirements.txt requirements.txt: openpyxl Install offline Download pip files beforehand: pip download -r requirements.txt -d ./pip_download Install downloaded files: pip install -r requirements.txt --no-index --find-links ./pip_download Install each .whl files: python -m pip install ./pip_download/XXX.whl create an xlsx file #!/bin/python3 import sys from openpyxl import Workbook # workbook write_wb = Workbook() # work sheet # write_ws = write_wb.create_sheet('ANewSheet') # pick and activate a sheet from the workbook write_ws = write_wb.
